Status: prototype Plus and minus symbols

What's the best way to mark-up plus and minus symbols?

Context

How can we make sure mathematical symbols are shown to all users?

We should probably use the minus symbol instead of a hyphen. It's also wider, so potentially more readable.

GDS recommend using the minus symbol.

Options

Option 1: plain language

positive 7 negative 3

or

plus 7 minus 3

Option 2: plus and hyphen symbols

+7

-3

JAWS 16 reads out "minus"

VoiceOver for Mac doesn't read "minus"

VoiceOver for iOS reads "minus"

Option 3: plus and minus symbols

+7

−3

JAWS 16 reads out "minus"

VoiceOver for Mac reads "minus"

VoiceOver for iOS reads "minus"

Option 3: HTML abbr tag (abbreviation)

+7

−3

Option 4: aria-label

+7

−3

Option 5: visuallyhidden class

plus+7

minus−3

Option 6: visuallyhidden and aria-hidden

+plus7

−minus3
